page.title: 07Yetholm Primary School (1)
page.content: Yetholm Primary, one of over 80 primary schools in the Borders Region. The majority of the 58 pupils come from Yetholm and Kirk Yetholm. The school serves a wide area with children coming from Blakelaw, Yetholm Mains, Sourhope, Primside Mill and Bowmont Hill, England. The school has three full time teachers, two live in Kelso, visiting specialists in P.E. Music and Art. The Wauchope Hall is used for P.E. Single Course meal, cooked in Morebattle, is available at 48p per day. Twenty five children have lunch, 50% of these being "Free Meals" The remainder of the children have packed lunch, a few go home. Inspectors visited the school in February 1985, the following is taken from a summary of thier report.The school operated in a set of buildings which were less than satisfactory.
